attributes.action: set up an English assembly like those in place in Scotland and Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently it is not possible for English MP's to vote on issues that only concern and affect Scotland and Wales, that is left down to their seperate assemblies. However it IS possible for Scottish and Welsh MP's to vote in the Commons on issues that only affect and concern England. Therefore we request that an assembly be set up to combat these English issues like those in Edinburgh and Cardiff. England has a right to rule itself as much as Scotland and Wales do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
